scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name urlcheck-database --template-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/urlcheck-database/template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=DBInstanceMasterUsernameParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_database_username ParameterKey=DBInstanceMasterPasswordParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_database_password && aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name urlcheck-database && aws lambda invoke --function-name urlcheck-database-create-schema
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name urlcheck-database --template-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/urlcheck-database/template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=DBInstanceMasterUsernameParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_database_username ParameterKey=DBInstanceMasterPasswordParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_database_password && aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name urlcheck-database && aws lambda invoke --function-name urlcheck-database-create-schema
scripts.upload-deploy: zip -r deploy.zip index.js node_modules && aws s3 cp deploy.zip s3://urlcheck-database/deploy.zip
scripts.setup: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket urlcheck-database --region eu-west-1 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=eu-west-1
scripts.create: npm run upload-deploy && npm run upload-template && npm run create-stack
scripts.update: npm run upload-deploy && npm run upload-template && npm run update-stack
scripts.delete: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name urlcheck-database && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name urlcheck-database
